SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Luxor.cz offers a comprehensive range of delivery methods within the Czech Republic, including Home Delivery, Parcel Shops, Parcel Lockers, and In-Store Pickup. 
PROVIDERS: The main delivery partners are PPL, Zásilkovna, and Balíkovna (Česká pošta). 
PRICING: In-store pickup is free. Parcel locker delivery starts at 25 Kč (PPL Parcelbox). Parcel shop delivery starts at 39 Kč (PPL). Home delivery starts at 69 Kč. Free shipping is available for all orders with a value of 999 Kč or more. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is 30 Kč for shipped orders. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The standout features are the completely free in-store pickup option available at 38 locations and a very competitive free shipping threshold of 999 Kč. A low-cost PPL Parcelbox option is also available for 25 Kč. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping and payment information is consolidated on a single, easy-to-understand page. All costs are clearly listed. However, the site does not provide specific end-to-end delivery timeframes, only dispatch times. There is no information available regarding express or weekend delivery services.
